def sort_emotions(arr, order):
    emotion_order = ['', ':)', ':|', ':(', 'T_T']
    sorted_emotions = sorted(arr, key=lambda x: emotion_order.index(x), reverse=not order)
    return sorted_emotions

def sort_emotions(arr, order):
    emotion_order = [':D', '', ':|', ':(', 'T_T']
    sorted_emotions = sorted(arr, key=lambda x: emotion_order.index(x), reverse=not order)
    return sorted_emotions

def sort_emotions(arr, order):
    emotion_order = [':D', ':)', ':|', ':(', '']
